explanation: [0-0] On a ship, a group of navy personnel in dark blue overalls and blue caps gather near a huge anchor chain. One person on the right side is wearing a white cap. A man in the front is holding a sledgehammer. In front of him is a massive chain with an anchor attached to it. The ship is surrounded by gray bulkheads, and the sky is bluish-gray.

[0-3] The worker with the hammer slams it down, breaking the anchor free from the chain. The chain begins to move quickly to the right side of the frame. The worker holding the hammer has a rope tied around his waist, and the people behind him are pulling the rope. As the man smashes the anchor, several people quickly step back and disappear from the frame. The camera moves to the right, and the man in the white hat raises his right hand, observing the chain and stepping back a few steps.

[0-3] The worker with the hammer slams it down, breaking the anchor free from the chain. The chain begins to move quickly to the right side of the frame. The worker holding the hammer has a rope tied around his waist, and the people behind him are pulling the rope. As the man smashes the anchor, several people quickly step back and disappear from the frame. The camera moves to the right, and the man in the white hat raises his right hand, observing the chain and stepping back a few steps.

As the man smashes the anchor, several people quickly step back and disappear from the frame. The camera moves to the right, and the man in the white hat raises his right hand, observing the chain and stepping back a few steps.

[3-10] The man in the white hat looks down to the lower left, then turns left and walks to the right side of the frame, watching the chain move as he walks. He jumps onto a black hydrant, leans over with both hands on the bulkhead, looks down, then turns back, jumps off the hydrant, and watches the chain return to its original position. The chain continues to move.

[10-16] The scene switches to the deep blue sea. A yellow anchor, connected to a long metal chain at the top, sinks towards the surface of the sea. The anchor enters the water, splashing up huge white waves. The anchor disappears, and the chain continues to descend. The mottled white walls of the ship's hull can be seen in the background.
